Name: COMMODITIES
EIF: provisionally on 1 July 1976, in accordance with article 50(a) and definitively on 14 June 1977, in accordance with article 49(a). The Agreement was extended until 30 June 1982 by Resolution No. 121 adopted by the International Tin Council on 14 January 1981 and was terminated in accordance with its provisions on 30 June 1982.
